Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the block by block homeownership program
Summary: Establishes the block by block homeownership program to provide capital subsidies for the purpose of constructing, preserving, and rehabilitating one- to two- family dwellings throughout the state, outside of NYC.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 & 1301, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing the block by block homeownership program
